title: Resolution on Public Health Funding
preamble: Mindful of the need to strengthen the National Health Service (NHS).
operativeClauses: Increase NHS funding by 10% for the fiscal year 2026.
Expand medical training programmes to address staffing shortages.
Establish new community health centres in under-served areas.
conclusion: This resolution reaffirms the UK’s commitment to universal healthcare access.

title: Resolution on Education Reform
preamble: Conscious of the role of education in fostering opportunity across the UK.
operativeClauses: Introduce mandatory digital literacy courses in all secondary schools.
Increase funding for apprenticeships and vocational training.
Expand access to free school meals for low-income families.
conclusion: This resolution lays out reforms to strengthen the UK’s education system.

title: Test Resolution
conclusion: this test is only a test
